results.title: Statins Inhibit Cytokines in a Dose-Dependent Response in Patients with Systemic Sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Statins, particularly @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, appear to have an immunosuppressive effect in reducing all @GENE_TNFRSF8 @GENE_943 @@@cytokine@@@ secretion levels from PBMCs of @<m>DISEASE_Scleroderma_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012595 @@@SSc@@@ in a dose-dependent manner.

results.title: Simvastatin prevents vascular complications in the chronic reactive oxygen species murine model of systemic sclerosis.
results.text_hl: Therefore, we evaluated the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ administration on aortic and small renal arteries thickening, and on myofibroblasts differentiation in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Scleroderma_Systemic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012595 @@@SSc@@@.
